BY POPULAR DEMAND.Definition: when a lot of people have asked for something

COUNTERPART.Definition: a person or thing with the same role or purpose as another in a different place

EXCLUSIVE.Definition: limited to a small group of people

BOARDING SCHOOL.Definition: a school where students live and study

UPBRINGING.Definition: the way in which you are brought up (treated and educated as a child)

DEBATING SOCIETY.Definition: a society in which debates are held

STEPPING STONE.Definition: something that helps you move forward or make progress

SCHOLARSHIP.Definition: an amount of money that is given to someone to reduce the cost of their education, usually based on need or merit

CHARISMATIC.Definition: having a natural ability to attract

SLY.Definition: someone who is sly is good at deceiving people

DISGUISED.Definition: hidden, pretending to be something else

TEDDY BEAR.Definition: a soft toy in the shape of a bear

CORRESPOND.Definition: to be similar or equal to

ELITE.Definition: relating to the richest and most powerful in society

SCREAMS.Definition: is something 'screams' something else, it means that the 'something else' is very obvious

SHY AWAY.Definition: to avoid showing or dealing with something, normally because you are embarrassed or not confident about it

ESCAPE ARTIST.Definition: someone who escapes from difficult situations

RHETORICAL.Definition: related to using speech in a way to impress

CONJURE UP.Definition: to make an image appear in someone's mind

DIVISIVE.Definition: something that is divisive causes disagreement between groups

BURQA.Definition: a piece of clothing worn by Muslim in some countries that covers the head, face and body

LETTER BOXES.Definition: the boxes where letters are put

RECKLESS.Definition: dangerous, without worrying about the risks

RHETORIC.Definition: speech that is effective at influencing others

FILTER.Definition: if someone doesn't have a filter, it means they say whatever is on their mind

HAIRDO.Definition: the way in which someone has their hair arranged

SCHOLAR.Definition: someone who studies in great detail

OUTSIDER.Definition: someone who is not included in a particular group

BANK BALANCE.Definition: the amount of money you have

WORKING CLASS.Definition: the social group that earns the least money in society

ALOOF.Definition: not friendly or willing to engage with others

ACCUSED.Definition: if you are accused of something, people say that you have done it

HOBBY.Definition: an activity you do for fun

MODEL OF RESTRAINT.Definition: if you are a model of restraint, you have shown a lot of self-control

UNFILTERED.Definition: not changed to suit the expectations of others
